species.name: politoed
descriptions: Although its cries sound like screams, a composer created a beautiful ballad that was influenced by the sounds.
At nightfall, these Pokémon appear on the shores of lakes. They announce their territorial claims by letting out cries that sound like shouting.
If Poliwag and Poliwhirl hear its echoing cry, they respond by gathering from far and wide.
It gathers groups of others as their leader. Its cries make Poliwag obey.
It’s the leader of Poliwag and Poliwhirl. When Politoed roars, they all cower in fear.

abilities.name: water-absorb
abilities.effect: Absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

abilities.name: damp
abilities.effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

abilities.name: drizzle
abilities.effect: Summons rain that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.
